languages.text: Услышав ваш голос, Мастер вокса восхваляет Императора Человечества. Вигдис объясняет, что вы попали в аномалию, заставляющую людей на корабле непостижимым образом меняться друг с другом местами. На поиски Лорд-капитана тут же направили спасательный отряд, но вы оказались быстрее и связались с Вигдис сами.

traits.locale_text: Услышав ваш голос, Мастер Вокса восхваляет Императора Человечества. Вигдис объясняет, что вы попали в аномалию, заставляющую людей на корабле непостижимым образом меняться друг с другом местами. На поиски Лорд-капитана тут же направили спасательный отряд, но вы оказались быстрее и связались с Вигдис сами.

languages.text: Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.
languages.original_text: Услышав ваш голос, Мастер вокса восхваляет Императора Человечества. Вигдис объясняет, что вы попали в аномалию, заставляющую людей на корабле непостижимым образом меняться друг с другом местами. На поиски Лорд-капитана тут же направили спасательный отряд, но вы оказались быстрее и связались с Вигдис сами.

traits.locale_text: Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you've been trapped in an anomaly that's making the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.

Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you've been trapped in an anomaly that's making the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.

Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you've been trapped in an anomaly that's making the people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.

Upon hearing the Lord Captain's voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that the Rogue Trader was trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but {mf|he|she} beat them to it and contacted Vigdis {mf|himself|herself}.

Upon hearing the Lord Captain's voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that the Rogue Trader was trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but {mf|he|she} beat them to it and contacted Vigdis {mf|himself|herself}.

Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.

languages.text: 听到你的声音之后，音阵大师立刻赞美起了帝皇。维格迪斯解释说，刚刚飞船上发生了异常情况，船上的一部分人莫名其妙地交换了位置。发生异常情况之后，军官们立刻组织了一支救援队去寻找失踪的行商浪人，但你的动作比救援队还要快，亲自联系到了维格迪斯。
languages.original_text: Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.

traits.locale_text: 听到你的声音之后，音阵大师立刻赞美起了帝皇。维格迪斯解释说，刚刚飞船上发生了异常情况，船上的一部分人莫名其妙地交换了位置。发生异常情况之后，军官们立刻组织了一支救援队去寻找失踪的行商浪人，但你的动作比救援队还要快，亲自联系到了维格迪斯。

languages.text: Al oír tu voz, la maestra de vocos da las gracias al Emperador de la Humanidad. Vigdis explica que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente habías sido atrapad{mf|o|a} por una anomalía que hacía que la gente cambiara sus posiciones en la nave. Se envió un escuadrón de rescate en tu busca, pero te has adelantado a ellos y has conseguido contactar con Vigdis personalmente.
languages.original_text: Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.

traits.locale_text: Al oír la voz de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, la maestra de vocos da las gracias al Emperador de la Humanidad. Vigdis explica que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente estaba atrapad{mf|o|a} en una anomalía que hacía que la gente cambiara sus posiciones en la nave. Se envió un escuadrón de rescate en su busca, pero se ha adelantado a ellos y ha conseguido contactar con Vigdis personalmente.

languages.text: あなたの声を聞くなり、マスター・ヴォクスは人類の皇帝に賛辞を送った。ヴィグディスは、船内の人々が不可解に入れ替わる異変にあなたが巻き込まれていたことを説明する。すぐに救助隊を派遣し捜索したが、それとは入れ違いでロード・キャプテンの方が先に連絡をくれたのだと言った。
languages.original_text: Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの声を聞くなり、マスター・ヴォクスは人類の皇帝に賛辞を送った。ヴィグディスは、船内の人々が不可解に入れ替わる異変にローグトレーダーが巻き込まれていたことを説明する。すぐに救助隊を派遣し捜索したが、それとは入れ違いでロード・キャプテンの方が先に連絡をくれたのだと言った。

languages.text: Als die Voxmeisterin deine Stimme hört, preist sie den Imperator der Menschheit. Vigdis erklärt, dass du in einer Anomalie gefangen warst, durch die Personen auf dem Schiff aus unerklärlichen Gründen die Plätze getauscht haben. Es wurde augenblicklich ein Rettungstrupp entsandt, um den Lord Captain zu retten, aber du bist ihnen zuvorgekommen und hast Vigdis selbst kontaktiert.
languages.original_text: Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.

traits.locale_text: Als die Voxmeisterin deine Stimme hört, preist sie den Imperator der Menschheit. Vigdis erklärt, dass du in einer Anomalie gefangen warst, durch die Personen auf dem Schiff aus unerklärlichen Gründen die Plätze getauscht haben. Es wurde augenblicklich ein Rettungstrupp entsandt, um den Lord Captain zu retten, aber du bist ihnen zuvorgekommen und hast Vigdis selbst kontaktiert.

Als die Voxmeisterin die Stimme des Lord Captains hört, preist sie den Imperator der Menschheit. Vigdis erklärt, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in einer Anomalie gefangen war, durch die Personen auf dem Schiff aus unerklärlichen Gründen die Plätze getauscht haben. Es wurde augenblicklich ein Rettungstrupp losgeschickt, um {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} zu retten, doch {mf|er|war} ihnen zuvorgekommen und hatte Vigdis schon selbst kontaktiert.

languages.text: En entendant votre voix, le Maître-Vox loue l'Empereur de l'humanité. Vigdis explique que vous avez été victime d'une anomalie qui a interverti les positions des individus à bord du vaisseau. Une équipe de secours avait été dépêchée immédiatement pour vous retrouver, mais vous avez été plus rapide et vous avez contacté Vigdis vous-même.
languages.original_text: Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.

traits.locale_text: En entendant votre voix, le Maître-Vox loue l'Empereur de l'humanité. Vigdis explique que vous avez été victime d'une anomalie qui a interverti les positions des individus à bord du vaisseau. Une équipe de secours avait été dépêchée immédiatement pour vous retrouver, mais vous avez été plus rapide et vous avez contacté Vigdis vous-même.

languages.text: Sesini duyan Voks Üstadı, İnsanlığın İmparatoru'na övgüler yağdırıyor. Vigdis, gemideki insanların açıklanamaz bir şekilde yer değiştirmesine neden olan bir anomaliye yakalandığını açıklıyor. Bir kurtarma ekibi, Lord Kaptan'ı aramak için hemen görevlendirilmiş ancak onlardan önce davranarak Vigdis ile kendin iletişime geçmeyi başarıyorsun.
languages.original_text: Upon hearing your voice, the Vox Master gives praise to the Emperor of Humanity. Vigdis explains that you were trapped in an anomaly that made people on the ship inexplicably trade places. A rescue squad was dispatched at once to search for the Lord Captain, but you beat them to it and contacted Vigdis yourself.
